workflow.name: Hotel guest journey automation with Gmail & Google Sheets
workflow.description:
**Automate your entire guest communication journey from booking to post-stay with personalized welcome emails, review requests, and daily operational reports.** Perfect for hotels, B&Bs, and short-term rental properties looking to enhance guest experience while reducing manual work and improving operational efficiency.

## How it works

1. **Pre-arrival welcome emails** - Automatically sends personalized welcome emails 1-2 days before guest check-in with reservation details, hotel amenities, and contact information
2. **Post-stay review requests** - Sends automated review request emails 24 hours after checkout with Google Reviews links and return guest discount codes  
3. **Daily staff reports** - Generates comprehensive arrival/departure reports every morning at 6 AM for front desk, housekeeping, and management teams
4. **Smart tracking** - Prevents duplicate emails by automatically updating tracking status in your Google Sheets database
5. **Professional templates** - Uses responsive HTML email templates that work across all devices and email clients

## Set up steps

1. **Connect Google Sheets** - Link your hotel reservation spreadsheet (must include columns for guest details, check-in/out dates, and email tracking)
2. **Configure Gmail account** - Set up Gmail credentials for sending automated emails
3. **Customize hotel information** - Update hotel name, contact details, and branding in the "Edit Fields" nodes
4. **Set staff email addresses** - Configure recipient addresses for daily operational reports
5. **Adjust timing** - Modify schedule triggers if you want different timing for emails and reports (currently set to every 6 hours for guest emails and 6 AM daily for staff reports)

**Time investment:** ~30 minutes for initial setup, then fully automated operation.

parameters.content:
üè® HOTEL GUEST COMMUNICATION AUTOMATION
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
‚ú® Complete guest journey automation from booking to post-stay
üìß Pre-arrival welcome emails (1-2 days before check-in)
‚≠ê Post-stay review requests (24 hours after checkout)  
üìä Daily staff reports for arrivals/departures (6 AM daily)
üîÑ Automatic tracking to prevent duplicate communications

üéØ PERFECT FOR: Hotels | B&Bs | Short-term rentals | Guest experience enhancement
üí° REDUCES: Manual work | Front desk inquiries | Missed follow-ups
üöÄ INCREASES: Guest satisfaction | Online reviews | Operational efficiency

## Who's it for
Hotel managers, property managers, and hospitality businesses wanting to automate guest communications and improve operational efficiency.

## How it works
The workflow monitors a Google Sheets reservation database and automatically sends personalized emails at optimal times during the guest journey, while generating daily operational reports for staff.

## How to set up
1. Replace the Google Sheets ID with your reservation spreadsheet
2. Update hotel name and contact information in the "Edit Fields" nodes
3. Configure your Gmail credentials for sending emails
4. Customize email templates with your branding
5. Set staff email addresses for daily reports

## Requirements
- Google Sheets with reservation data
- Gmail account for sending emails
- n8n instance (self-hosted or cloud)

## How to customize
- Modify email templates in Gmail nodes
- Adjust timing in Schedule Trigger nodes
- Add more data fields in Google Sheets integration
- Customize report format in "Create Email HTML" node

Originally from India, I spent two amazing years in Rome earning my Master's in Data Science, where I fell in love with the intersection of AI, automation, and creative problem-solving.

data.details: The Filter node can be used to filter items based on a condition. If the condition is met, the item will be passed on to the next node. If the condition is not met, the item will be omitted. Conditions can be combined together by AND(meet all conditions), or OR(meet at least one condition).
